articles.title: Spider-Man’s Tom Holland splashes £3m on six-bed London mansion for co-star girlfriend Zendaya... - The Sun
articles.content:
SPIDER-MAN stars Tom Holland and Zendaya have picked up the keys to a plush £3million mansion with six bedrooms as they make London their home.

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: All Freeview, Sky Q, and Virgin viewers will see a long-awaited channel return this week - Express
articles.description: AFTER YEARS of waiting, viewers on Freeview, Sky Q, BT TV and Virgin Media boxes will see the resurrection of a popular BBC channel this week. Here's everything you need to know about the relaunch of BBC Three.
articles.content: Also confirmed for launch week, BBC Three will be hosting live football, with both semi-finals and the final of the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) live on free-to-air television. The huge tournament f… [+1622 chars]
